title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go         A park ranger points the way. NPS photo  Start your visit to Sunset Crater Volcano at the Visitor Center. Need information on a place to pitch your tent? Seasonal camping is available at Bonito Campground.  For futher information contact the Coconino National Forest at 928-526-0866.
